A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: not your typical Star Wars movie. oh sure\, it's got light sabre fights\, lineage of the skywalker family taking center stage\, stormtroopers\, some kind of cute animals\, the Force.....ok\, maybe it is like the others. The effects are great\, good comedy moments\, good story (finally no death star)\, and my favorite part was the \"connection\" between Rey and Kylo Ren. If you get a chance to see it in the theaters\, definitely do.
